facts.fact_text: Barrick plans to spin off its top North American gold assets in an initial public offering later this year.

evidences.evidence_text: Barrick plans to spin off its top North American gold assets in an initial public offering later this year as part of a strategic reset.

evidence.evidence_text: TSX Futures Slip on Tech and Mining Weakness Futures tracking the S&P/TSX Composite Index fell on Thursday, pressured by ongoing weakness in software stocks and a renewed drop in precious metal prices.

links.source_ref: US and Iran agreed to hold talks in Oman on Friday

evidence.evidence_text: Oil also slid sharply after the US and Iran agreed to hold talks in Oman on Friday, easing fears of regional supply disruptions and pressuring energy shares.
